title: Timeless Colorblock Sheath Dress
body_html: The sheath silhouette you love, now in season's favorite plum and barely pink. Cut from our signature crepe, the Timeles Sheath Dress contours the body without compromising on comfort. Featuring a sleevesless design, a centre-back zipper and V-neckline, the slim pencil silhouette is beautifully detailed: note the striking pleated slit detailing that gives the functionality of a slit without the exposure. it's wrinkle resistant and even machine washable, so you can skip the dry cleaners. Slip on with tonal or contrast footwear and youâ€™ll be good to go from 9 to 9!

body_html: Effortlessly elegant, the Focus Fit and Flare Dress boasts a flattering silhouette with its fit and flare design. The cross-belt detail is designed to flatter and contour without restricting movement, while the three-fourth sleeves and convenient pockets add functionality. Crafted from premium crepe fabric, this is classic workwear is our take on fusing sensibility and sophistication.

title: Resilience Sheath Dress
body_html: The Resilience Sheath Dress features blended pockets and is designed to take you from day to night in subtle sophistication. With its sheath silhouette, three-quarter length sleeves and back zip, it's both flattering and functional. Plus, the high neckline makes it the ideal canvas for endless accessories. Designed to put you in control in high stakes work situations with a no-nonsense broad belt while flattering the silhouette for that extra confidence.

title: Iconic Asymmetric Colorblock Sheath Dress
body_html:
Our much-loved pencil silhouette is back, reimagined as the Iconic Sheath Dress in endlessly chic colorblock. Falling just below the knee, our unique detailing elevates the bodycon shape: note the smartphone pockets, perfect sleeveless and considered cut that nip in the waist. Plus, it's supremely comfortable and flattering, crafted from our sculpting and stretchy heavyweight knit. It's a polished look that'll make you feel confident for those all-important work moments.
This Sheath Dress is part of our Future Classics collection: structured, stretchy, seriously chic. Our innovative knitwear is expertly engineered for a universally flattering fit.

title: Forever Dress Pants for Women with Satin Piping
body_html:
Made from luxurious crepe, these wrinkle-resistant dress pants for women provide comfort and style for those long 9-9 workdays. The deep pockets and satin lining elevate the look, making these pants a must-have for any wardrobe. Woven for a mechanical stretch, they're ultra-comfortable and stay looking sharp throughout the day. Crisp pressed creases, belt loops and front pockets elevate the classic silhouette, while the waistband has an elasticated back for the perfect, comfortable fit. Wear with our Artistry jacket impactful and statement making work look.
Part of our Future Classics Collection: washable, breathable and crease-resistant, these flattering pieces form the foundation of a hard-working capsule loved by our customers season after season.

title: Passion Relaxed Shift Dress
body_html: The Passion Relaxed Shift Dress is made for fans of the classic shift dress who also appreciate a bit of glamor. This easy go-to style features a crew neck with pleats and a gorgeous satin panel at the bottom. The dress features pockets for convenience and a relaxed fit thanks to its curve-friendly design, hemline that falls just above the knee and mild stretch. A minimalistic design that never goes out of style and gives you the sharp look you need for that important presentation at work.

body_html: The Charisma Fit and Flare Dress features a fitted bodice and a flared skirt for an especially hip-friendly silhouette. The asymmetric front drape, high boat neck, invisible back zip and hidden pockets makes this a no-brainer style pick for your nine-to-nine day. The flare skirt allows you to move swiftly with ease. Style with black heels and let the dress speak for itself or go bold with color blocked footwear and add a feel-good charm to your day.

body_html: Effortlessly blending elegance and comfort, the Pinnacle Stretch Dress for women is a versatile wardrobe essential. Featuring a beautifully gathered bodice, delicate button details, and an asymmetrical stand collar, this dress is sophisticated enough for special occasions yet comfortable for long office hours. Crafted from machine-washable Lycra, it offers exceptional stretch and seamlessly returns to its original shape. Designed to fall just at the knee, this dress transitions effortlessly between seasonsâ€”perfect bare-legged for warmer days or paired with tights in cooler weather.

title: Catalyst Pocket Frill Formal Pants for Women
body_html:
Thought-Provoking. Powerful. Feel Good.
The Catalyst Pocket Frill formal pants for women are crafted with our signature crepe fabric that has mild mechanical stretch, and is crease-resistant. It features a long leg design for a sharp silhouette and an elegant stretchable waist for post lunch comfort. Finished with pocket frill detail on deep functional pockets the Catalyst trousers is the epitome of fuss-free tailoring â€“ machine washable, sculpting and seriously luxurious.
The mid-waisted, slightly flared shape feels contemporary and looks flattering on everyone. Team with our navy Prodigy jacket.
